title: TAG-140 Deploys DRAT V2 RAT, Targeting Indian Government, Defense, and Rail Sectors
summary:
A hacking group with ties other than Pakistan has been found targeting Indian government organizations with a modified variant of a remote access trojan (RAT) called DRAT.
The activity has been attributed by Recorded Future's Insikt Group to a threat actor tracked as TAG-140, which it said overlaps

title: OpenAI says GPT-5 will unify breakthroughs from different models
summary: OpenAI has again confirmed that it will unify multiple models into one and create GPT-5, which is expected to ship sometime in the summer. [...]

title: Hands on with Windows 11 Notepad's new markdown support
summary: Notepad now lets you use markdown text formatting on Windows 11, which means you can write in Notepad just like you could in WordPad. [...]

title: ChatGPT is testing disruptive Study Together feature
summary: OpenAI's "Study together" mode has been spotted in the wild, and it could help students prepare for exams directly from ChatGPT. [...]
